trans-unit.target: TEXT_FESEST2026ENTRANCE_00960_ENTRANCEMAN0960_000_000<tab>With Nonotta's blessing, we shall bear you to the egg hunting arena on a moment's notice.
TEXT_FESEST2026ENTRANCE_00960_ENTRANCEMAN0960_000_001<tab>When you are ready, I shall escort you to the egg hunting arena. If I may provide any further assistance, do not hestitate to let me know.
TEXT_FESEST2026ENTRANCE_00960_SYSTEM_000_002<tab>In order to continue this quest, you must first participate in Sprig Cleaning and achieve a score of 1 point or higher.
TEXT_FESEST2026ENTRANCE_00960_SYSTEM_000_003<tab>You may learn more about Sprig Cleaning by speaking with the egg usher.
TEXT_FESEST2026ENTRANCE_00960_Q1_100_000<tab>何をする？ <var 48 F201FA /var><var 49 F201FB /var>[ハイスコア：<var 20 E802 /var>]<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>

TEXT_FESEST2026ENTRANCE_00960_TALK_SYSTEM_000_010<tab>Before participating in Sprig Cleaning, you must cancel any pending Duty Finder registrations or party member recruitments, and withdraw from any party you are currently in.
TEXT_FESEST2026ENTRANCE_00960_TALK_SYSTEM_000_015<tab>As your inventory is full, you may be unable to receive all rewards.
